ctlogo.function

Class AbstractFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctlogo.function.AbstractFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcosFunction, AsinFunction, Atan2Function, AtanFunction, BackwardFunction, CleanFunction, ClearScreenFunction, CosFunction, ForwardFunction, HideTurtleFunction, LeftFunction, MakeFunction, PendownFunction, PenupFunction, PrintFunction, RightFunction, SetxFunction, SetxyFunction, SetyFunction, ShowTurtleFunction, SinFunction, TanFunction, XcorFunction, YcorFunction

    public abstract class AbstractFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function

    This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Function interface to minimise the effort required to implement this interface.

    This class will do verification work when generating an Expression object.

    To extend a concrete class from this abstract class, one need to implement two methods, Function.getDefaultParameterNum() and execute(Context, List), the later one will be the behaviour of the Logo function. On default, this method assumes that the Logo function only accepts exactly Function.getDefaultParameterNum() parameters, i.e. no variable number of parameters, if this is not the case, override the two methods instead.

    Author:
    Paul Yang
